Name: Direct Intake
Preconditions: User auth with Inventory role; Supplier exists; Categories configured
Outcomes: Batch created AWAITING_INTAKE; onHandQty set; Audit trail; Media linked
ErrorPaths: Validation errors show field-level; API error shows toast

Name: Procure-to-Pay
Preconditions: User auth with Inventory/Accounting role; Supplier exists; Products defined
Outcomes: PO tracked lifecycle; Batches created on receipt; Bill in AP; GL posted on payment
ErrorPaths: PO validation errors; Receiving qty > ordered warning
CrossFlowTouchpoints: GF-007 (received goods); GF-004 (bill payment AP side)

Name: Order-to-Cash
Preconditions: User auth with Sales role; Customer exists; Sellable batches available
Outcomes: Order with line items; Inventory reserved; Invoice generated; Payment recorded; Order shipped
ErrorPaths: Insufficient inventory; Customer validation; Payment > due rejected
RoleRequirements: Sales Rep; Sales Manager; Accounting; Fulfillment

Name: Invoice and Payment
Preconditions: User auth with Accounting role; Invoice exists from order
StepsSummary: 1.Navigate /accounting/invoices 2.View invoice list 3.Select invoice 4.Record payment 5.Validate amount 6.Submit 7.GL entries posted 8.Client balance synced
Outcomes: Payment recorded; Invoice status updated; GL balanced; Client totalOwed updated
ErrorPaths: Amount > amountDue rejected; Invoice VOID/PAID rejected

Name: Pick and Pack
Preconditions: User auth with Fulfillment/Admin role; Confirmed order with reserved inventory
StepsSummary: 1.Navigate /pick-pack 2.View queue 3.Select order 4.View items 5.Pick items 6.Pack to bags 7.Mark ready 8.Ship 9.Deliver
Outcomes: Items picked/packed; Order SHIPPED; reservedQty decremented; Movement logged
ErrorPaths: Unpack requires reason; Partial pick not supported
RulesReferenced: RULE-009 (all items packed to ship); RULE-010 (unpack audit)

Name: Client Ledger Review
Preconditions: User auth with Accounting/Sales role; Client exists with transactions
StepsSummary: 1.View dashboard AR/AP 2.Navigate /clients 3.Select client 4.Click View Ledger 5.View transactions 6.Filter 7.Export CSV 8.Add adjustment
Outcomes: Transaction history displayed; Running balance correct; Aging visible; Export accurate
ErrorPaths: No transactions - empty state; Export format errors
RoleRequirements: Accounting Manager; Sales Manager; Super Admin

Name: Inventory Management
Preconditions: User auth with Inventory role; Batches exist
StepsSummary: 1.Navigate /inventory 2.View dashboard 3.Filter/search 4.Select batch 5.View details 6.Adjust quantity 7.Change status 8.Bulk operations
Outcomes: Inventory displayed accurately; Adjustments logged; Status validated; Movements logged
ErrorPaths: Negative qty prevented; Invalid status transition rejected

Name: Sample Request
Preconditions: User auth with Sales role; Sample inventory available; Allocation not exceeded
Outcomes: Sample request created; sampleQty decremented; Allocation tracked; Location history
RoleRequirements: Sales Rep; Sales Manager; Super Admin

Name: User Login
Preconditions: Valid credentials; QA_AUTH_ENABLED for test accounts
Outcomes: Session created; User redirected to dashboard
ErrorPaths: Invalid credentials; Account locked; MFA required

Name: Generate Invoice from Order
Outcomes: Invoice created DRAFT; Linked to order
ErrorPaths: Order not confirmed; Invoice already exists

Name: Void Invoice
Preconditions: Invoice not PAID; User has accounting:delete
Outcomes: Invoice VOID; GL reversed if entries exist

Name: Bulk Inventory Status Change
Preconditions: Multiple batches selected; User has inventory:update
ErrorPaths: Invalid transition for any batch rejects all
